content.question: The Treaty of Berlin in 1878 reflected general European agreement on which of the following?

choices.label: Reduction of tariffs and trade barriers
The building of a railroad to Baghdad
Boundaries and spheres of influence in the Balkans

content.answer: Boundaries and spheres of influence in the Balkans

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
